name: French Onion Burger Recipe by Tasty
description: Here's what you need: ground beef, salt, pepper, oil, hamburger bun, comté cheese, caramelized onion, fresh arugula, mustard
recipeInstructionSteps: Mix together the patty ingredients until evenly combined.
Form the beef into a round patty.
Heat oil in a pan over medium heat.
Cook the burgers for 3 minutes on the first side, flip, and place the slice of comté on top.
Assemble the burgers on the buns with caramelized onions and arugula.
